languages.text: "Разные ветви {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Эльдари{/g} избрали разные пути к спасению. Мои предки выбрали вечную дорогу сквозь звездную тьму — жизнь на {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мирах-кораблях{/g} вместо настоящих миров. Мы спасли многие чудеса прежних дней... но далеко не все. Ты видел{mf||а} на Лилэтан — даже мы не всегда можем совладать с вратами, поставленными нашими древними". {n}Немного помолчав, Ирлиэт добавляет:{/n} "Это история Детей Азуриана. Есть ветви, избравшие иной путь, темный и страшный. Но о них я не хочу тебе рассказывать. Это наша темная грань, у твоих сородичей их тоже немало".

traits.locale_text: "Разные ветви {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Эльдари{/g} избрали разные пути к спасению. Мои предки выбрали вечную дорогу сквозь звездную тьму — жизнь на {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мирах-кораблях{/g} вместо настоящих миров. Мы спасли многие чудеса прежних дней... но далеко не все. Ты видел{mf||а} на Лилэтан — даже мы не всегда можем совладать с вратами, поставленными нашими древними". {n}Немного помолчав, Ирлиэт добавляет:{/n} "Это история Детей Азуриана. Есть ветви, избравшие иной путь, темный и страшный. Но о них я не хочу тебе рассказывать. Это наша темная грань, у твоих сородичей их тоже немало".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Different branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} chose different paths to salvation. My ancestors chose an eternal journey through the starry void — living on {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworlds{/g} instead of real planets. We rescued countless wonders from the days before... but far from all. You saw this on the Lilaethan — not even we can always master the gates our ancient ones built." {n}After a brief pause, Yrliet adds,{/n} "This is the story of the Asuryani. There are branches that chose a different path, gruesome and frightening. But I do not wish to tell you about them. That is our dark side, just as your kin have many dark sides of their own."
languages.original_text: "Разные ветви {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Эльдари{/g} избрали разные пути к спасению. Мои предки выбрали вечную дорогу сквозь звездную тьму — жизнь на {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мирах-кораблях{/g} вместо настоящих миров. Мы спасли многие чудеса прежних дней... но далеко не все. Ты видел{mf||а} на Лилэтан — даже мы не всегда можем совладать с вратами, поставленными нашими древними". {n}Немного помолчав, Ирлиэт добавляет:{/n} "Это история Детей Азуриана. Есть ветви, избравшие иной путь, темный и страшный. Но о них я не хочу тебе рассказывать. Это наша темная грань, у твоих сородичей их тоже немало".

traits.locale_text: "Different branches of the Aeldari chose different paths to salvation. My ancestors chose an eternal journey through the starry void — the life on Craftworlds instead of proper planets. We rescued countless wonders from the days before... But far from all. You saw this on Lilaethan — not even we can always master the gates our ancient ones had built." {n}Yrliet adds after a brief pause:{/n} "This is the story of the children of Asuryan. There are branches that chose a different way, gruesome and frightening. But I do not wish to tell you about them. This is our dark side, just as your kin have plenty of dark sides of their own."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Different branches of the Aeldari chose different paths to salvation. We rescued countless wonders from the days before... but far from all. You saw this on the Lilaethan — not even we can always master the gates our ancient ones built." {n}After a brief pause, Yrliet adds,{/n} "This is the story of the Asuryani. There are branches that chose a different path, gruesome and frightening. But I do not wish to tell you about them. That is our dark side, just as your kin have many dark sides of their own."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的不同族群，选择了不同的救赎之路。我的先祖选择遁入群星之中，踏上永恒的旅途。我们不再生活在真正的行星上，而是生活在我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}里。我们从过去的遗产中回收了无数奇迹造物……但那远远不是全部。你在莉莱赞也看到了这一点，即便是我们，也无法彻底理解我们的先祖所建造的大门。”{n}伊莉耶特短暂地顿了顿，继续补充道。{/n}“这就是我们方舟灵族的故事。还有的族群选择了其他道路，那些道路令人毛骨悚然，我不想多说他们的情况。他们是我们的黑暗面，正如你的亲族之中，也有很多人是你的黑暗面一样。”
languages.original_text: "Different branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} chose different paths to salvation. My ancestors chose an eternal journey through the starry void — living on {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworlds{/g} instead of real planets. We rescued countless wonders from the days before... but far from all. You saw this on the Lilaethan — not even we can always master the gates our ancient ones built." {n}After a brief pause, Yrliet adds,{/n} "This is the story of the Asuryani. There are branches that chose a different path, gruesome and frightening. But I do not wish to tell you about them. That is our dark side, just as your kin have many dark sides of their own."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Different branches of the Aeldari chose different paths to salvation. My ancestors chose an eternal journey through the starry void — living on craftworlds instead of real planets. We rescued countless wonders from the days before... but far from all. You saw this on the Lilaethan — not even we can always master the gates our ancient ones built." {n}After a brief pause, Yrliet adds,{/n} "This is the story of the Asuryani. There are branches that chose a different path, gruesome and frightening. But I do not wish to tell you about them. That is our dark side, just as your kin have many dark sides of their own."

languages.text: «Las distintas ramas de los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} tomaron distintos caminos a la salvación. Mis ancestros eligieron un viaje eterno por el vacío estrellado, viviendo en {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundos astronave{/g} en lugar de en planetas. Rescatamos innumerables maravillas de los días pasados... pero aún estamos muy lejos de recuperarlas todas. Ya lo viste en el Lilaethan: ni siquiera nosotros podemos controlar siempre los portales que construyeron nuestros ancestros». {n}Tras una breve pausa, Yrliet añade:{/n} «Esta es la historia de los Asuryani. Otras ramas tomaron un camino distinto, salvaje y aterrador, pero no deseo hablarte de ellas. Ese es nuestro lado oscuro, al igual que tu gente también tiene muchos lados oscuros».
languages.original_text: "Different branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} chose different paths to salvation. My ancestors chose an eternal journey through the starry void — living on {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworlds{/g} instead of real planets. We rescued countless wonders from the days before... but far from all. You saw this on the Lilaethan — not even we can always master the gates our ancient ones built." {n}After a brief pause, Yrliet adds,{/n} "This is the story of the Asuryani. There are branches that chose a different path, gruesome and frightening. But I do not wish to tell you about them. That is our dark side, just as your kin have many dark sides of their own."

traits.locale_text: «Las distintas ramas de los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} tomaron distintos caminos a la salvación. Mis ancestros eligieron un viaje eterno por el vacío estrellado, viviendo en {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundos astronave{/g} en lugar de en planetas. Rescatamos innumerables maravillas de los días pasados... pero aún estamos muy lejos de recuperarlas todas. Ya lo viste en el Lilaethan: ni siquiera nosotros podemos controlar siempre los portales que construyeron nuestros ancestros». {n}Tras una breve pausa, Yrliet añade:{/n} «Esta es la historia de los Asuryani. Otras ramas tomaron un camino distinto, salvaje y aterrador, pero no deseo hablarte de ellas. Ese es nuestro lado oscuro, al igual que tu gente también tiene muchos lados oscuros».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の支族は、それぞれ異なる救済の道を選んだ。我の父祖は、惑星ではなく{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}に住み、星の虚空の中を永遠に旅する道を選んだのだ。我らは以前の時代から数え切れないほどの驚異を救ってきた。お前もリラエタンで見ただろう。我らで自身すら、古き者たちが築いた門をいつでも使いこなせるわけではないのだ」{n}しばしの沈黙の後、ユリエットは付け加える。{/n}「これはアシュリヤーニの物語だ。ぞっとするような恐ろしい道を選んだ支族もある。しかし、我はお前たちに彼らのことを話すつもりはない。それは我らの暗黒面なのだ。お前たちの同族が数多の暗黒面を持っているのと同じくな」
languages.original_text: "Different branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} chose different paths to salvation. My ancestors chose an eternal journey through the starry void — living on {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworlds{/g} instead of real planets. We rescued countless wonders from the days before... but far from all. You saw this on the Lilaethan — not even we can always master the gates our ancient ones built." {n}After a brief pause, Yrliet adds,{/n} "This is the story of the Asuryani. There are branches that chose a different path, gruesome and frightening. But I do not wish to tell you about them. That is our dark side, just as your kin have many dark sides of their own."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の支族は、それぞれ異なる救済の道を選んだ。我の父祖は、惑星ではなく{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}に住み、星の虚空の中を永遠に旅する道を選んだのだ。我らは以前の時代から数え切れないほどの驚異を救ってきた。お前もリラエタンで見ただろう。我らで自身すら、古き者たちが築いた門をいつでも使いこなせるわけではないのだ」{n}しばしの沈黙の後、ユリエットは付け加える。{/n}「これはアシュリヤーニの物語だ。ぞっとするような恐ろしい道を選んだ支族もある。しかし、我はお前たちに彼らのことを話すつもりはない。それは我らの暗黒面なのだ。お前たちの同族が数多の暗黒面を持っているのと同じくな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Unterschiedliche Zweige der {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} wählen unterschiedliche Pfade zur Erlösung. Meine Ahnen wählten eine ewige Reise durch das sternenbehangene Nichts — sie lebten auf {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiffen{/g} statt auf echten Planeten. Wir retteten unzählige Wunder aus den Tagen davor ... doch längst nicht alle. Ihr habt dies auf der Welt der Lileath gesehen — nicht einmal wir können die Tore, die unsere Ahnen errichtet haben, immer meistern." {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause fügt Yrliet hinzu:{/n} "Dies ist die Geschichte der Asuryani. Es gibt Zweige, die einen anderen Pfad wählen, grausam und furchterregend. Doch von ihnen möchte ich Euch nicht erzählen. Das ist unsere dunkle Seite, genau wie auch Euer Volk viele dunkle Seiten hat."
languages.original_text: "Different branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} chose different paths to salvation. My ancestors chose an eternal journey through the starry void — living on {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworlds{/g} instead of real planets. We rescued countless wonders from the days before... but far from all. You saw this on the Lilaethan — not even we can always master the gates our ancient ones built." {n}After a brief pause, Yrliet adds,{/n} "This is the story of the Asuryani. There are branches that chose a different path, gruesome and frightening. But I do not wish to tell you about them. That is our dark side, just as your kin have many dark sides of their own."

Meine Ahnen wählten eine ewige Reise durch das sternenbehangene Nichts — sie lebten auf {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiffen{/g} statt auf echten Planeten. Wir retteten unzählige Wunder aus den Tagen davor ... doch längst nicht alle. Ihr habt dies auf der Welt der Lileath gesehen — nicht einmal wir können die Tore, die unsere Ahnen errichtet haben, immer meistern." {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause fügt Yrliet hinzu:{/n} "Dies ist die Geschichte der Asuryani. Es gibt Zweige, die einen anderen Pfad wählen, grausam und furchterregend. Doch von ihnen möchte ich Euch nicht erzählen. Das ist unsere dunkle Seite, genau wie auch Euer Volk viele dunkle Seiten hat."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Chacune des branches des {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g} a cherché le salut à sa propre manière. Mes ancêtres ont décidé de se lancer dans un voyage éternel à travers le vide étoilé, en habitant sur des {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseaux-mondes{/g} au lieu de planètes. Nous avons réussi à sauver d'innombrables merveilles de notre vie d'avant... mais pas toutes, loin de là. Vous l'avez vue sur la lilaethan : nous ne sommes nous-mêmes pas toujours capables d'ouvrir les portes construites par les anciens. » {n}Après une courte pause, Yrliet ajoute :{/n} « Voilà l'histoire des Asuryanis. Certaines branches ont choisi une voie différente, brutale et terrifiante, mais je ne souhaite pas vous en parler. Comme votre espèce, qui ne manque pas de facettes inavouables, nous avons nous aussi un côté obscur. »
languages.original_text: "Different branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} chose different paths to salvation. My ancestors chose an eternal journey through the starry void — living on {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworlds{/g} instead of real planets. We rescued countless wonders from the days before... but far from all. You saw this on the Lilaethan — not even we can always master the gates our ancient ones built." {n}After a brief pause, Yrliet adds,{/n} "This is the story of the Asuryani. There are branches that chose a different path, gruesome and frightening. But I do not wish to tell you about them. That is our dark side, just as your kin have many dark sides of their own."

Nous avons réussi à sauver d'innombrables merveilles de notre vie d'avant... mais pas toutes, loin de là. Vous l'avez vue sur la lilaethan : nous ne sommes nous-mêmes pas toujours capables d'ouvrir les portes construites par les anciens. » {n}Après une courte pause, Yrliet ajoute :{/n} « Voilà l'histoire des Asuryanis. Certaines branches ont choisi une voie différente, brutale et terrifiante, mais je ne souhaite pas vous en parler. Comme votre espèce, qui ne manque pas de facettes inavouables, nous avons nous aussi un côté obscur. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Farklı sınıflara dâhil {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldariler{/g}, kurtuluşa uzanan farklı yollar seçtiler. Atalarım, yıldızlı uçsuz boyunca uzanan ebedî bir yolculuğa çıkmayı seçti. Hakiki gezegenler yerine {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünyalarda{/g} yaşadılar. Evvelden kalma sayısız harikayı kurtarmayı başardık ama... Tamamını kurtaramadık. Buna Lilaethan'da da şahit olmuştun. Bizler bile kadim atalarımızın inşa ettiği geçitleri her daim ustalıkla kullanamayız." {n}Yrliet, kısa bir duraklamanın ardından devam ediyor.{/n} "Asuryanilerin tarihi budur işte. Aramızda farklı, dehşet verici ve ürkütücü yollar seçen sınıflar da var. Ancak sana onlardan bahsetmeye niyetim yok. Nasıl senin soydaşlarının pek çok karanlık tarafı varsa bu da bizim karanlık tarafımız."
languages.original_text: "Different branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} chose different paths to salvation. My ancestors chose an eternal journey through the starry void — living on {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworlds{/g} instead of real planets. We rescued countless wonders from the days before... but far from all. You saw this on the Lilaethan — not even we can always master the gates our ancient ones built." {n}After a brief pause, Yrliet adds,{/n} "This is the story of the Asuryani. There are branches that chose a different path, gruesome and frightening. But I do not wish to tell you about them. That is our dark side, just as your kin have many dark sides of their own."

traits.locale_text: "Farklı sınıflara dâhil {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}ler, kurtuluşa uzanan farklı yollar seçtiler. Atalarım, yıldızlı uçsuz boyunca uzanan ebedî bir yolculuğa çıkmayı seçtiler. Hakiki gezegenler yerine {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünya{/g}larda yaşadılar. Günler öncesinden sayısız harikayı kurtarmayı başardık ama... Tamamını kurtaramadık. Buna Lilaethan'da da şahit olmuştun. Bizler bile kadim atalarımızın inşa ettiği geçitleri her daim ustalıkla kullanamayız." {n}Kısa bir duraklamanın ardından Yrliet devam ediyor.{/n} "Asuryani'nin tarihi bu işte. Aramızda farklı bir yol seçen farklı sınıflar mevcut, yolları dehşet verici ve ürkütücü. Ancak onlara senden bahsetmeye niyetim yok. Bu, bizim karanlık tarafımız. Tıpkı senin soydaşlarının da pek çok karanlık tarafı olması gibi..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
